creator: bschneider@vecna.com
text:
right now to use SMTPAppender you have to set the host, from address, etc. all
explicitly.  there is no way to set a JNDI name for a javax.mail.Session to pull
from the server's context. 

this would be a significant convenience to avoid duplicate configuration.

creator: genman@noderunner.net
text:
Checked in fix to SVN head.

Call "setSessionJNDI" or use the appropriate setter in your config.

I only added a negative test, but should work.

Note for application servers, your session must be bound before adding the
appender.  E.g. with JBoss won't work in log4j.xml.
